content: I am a Software Developer with experience in designing and developing applications. I have expertise in various technologies and frameworks. I am a fast learner and have strong willingness to explore new things. I am interseted in working in this field because of the rapid pace of technologies advencement, making it undenieable that technology will become an essential part of our lives on large scale, and I must keep up with its development. I hope to leverage these advencement for the well-being of many people.

I am a graduate of the Software Engineering major at Telkom Institute of Technology Purwokerto. During my studies, I participated in several programs, such as Ruangguru Acceleration Bootcamp, where I gained hands-on experience in Backend Development. I also joined Bangkit Academy, focusing on Cloud Computing using Google Cloud. From the various programs I have participated in, I have gained both soft skills and hard skills that are sufficient to support my career growth.
